idea:
For more than a century X-ray radiation has been a valuable tool for imaging the human body. This imaging capability is used extensively to detect and diagnose disease and injury, manage patient care, and guide many forms of treatment. X ray procedure imparts energy with ionizing capability to the tissues of the body. Hence specific action must be taken to minimize any associated risk to the patient by eliminating any radiation exposure that is not required for the formation of the images necessary for each clinical objective. Diagnostic radiology contributes the maximum to population dose among the man-made radiation sources. It is essential that the dose to the patient is kept "As Low As Reasonably Achievable (ALARA)". The patient dose can be reduced by getting good quality images by the first take itself thereby avoiding retakes.

The first step in achieving the above objective is to have the machine periodically evaluated in the quality control program by a certified engineer to verify the output of the x-ray machine to get good quality images
name: CONRAD MEDICAL SOLUTIONS

idea:
Since the enactment of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code 2016, investment in stressed/distressed assets has matured in India. Banks and financial institutions are seeking to release capital by selling non-performing assets at attractive discounts to investors. Simultaneously, distressed companies are seeking funds from various investors to cover financing for projects or to reach a settlement with banks and FIs.

In an attempt to support the selling and purchasing of distressed property, Immense Verity LLP is on a mission to make India NPA free and attempt to support the selling and purchasing of distressed properties. This innovative idea came to reality with a combination of expertise coming together for creating a win-win situation for Bankers, Borrowers & Buyers [Investors]. Immense Verity LLP will provide an ideal platform for 3 B’s to achieve 3 C’s:

1. Bankers [and other financial institutions facing NPA problems]

2. Borrowers &

3. Buyers [Investors]

where we will

1. Comfort Bankers by relieving them from NPA Assets,

2. Create Value for buyers or Investors and

3. Curtail the burden of borrowers.
name: Immense Verity

idea:
AGRICULTURES

To achieve self-sufficiency in food production. To increase Agricultural production and income of farmers / farm labours. To promote sustainable use of Natural Resources such as Land and Water. To promote Soil Health Management and Integrated Nutrient Management. Promote Crop Diversification. Promote use of agricultural inputs based on recommendation of soil and water testing. To ensure availability and quality of agricultural inputs. Promote Organic Farming. To promote Integrated Pest – Disease Management system. To transfer modern agriculture technique developed by technical institutes and scientists. To promote agricultural mechanization to carryout agriculture operation timely. To promote mixed-intensive farming for increased employment opportunities and income per unit area. To develop scientific farming techniques for making agriculture more remunerative for farmers. To promote women empowerment in agriculture. Poultry farm, dairy farm, cows, goats, buffaloes, Seafood, egg, meat, milk, To augment Production of milk, meat, egg and other animal bi-products.
name: BLUE AGRO PHOENIXE PRIVATE LIMITED
